Package sndlib.core.statistics

Interface Summary
ProblemStatisticValueKey This interface provides the facility to calculate any statistical value of a given network design Problem.
SolutionStatisticValueKey This interface provides the facility to calculate any statistical value of a given Solution (respectively a SolvedProblem).
 

Class Summary
ProblemStatistics This class provides the common methods to calculate statistics of a given network design Problem.
SolutionStatistics This class provides the common methods to calculate statistics of a given Solution of a network design problem (respectively a SolvedProblem).
 

Enum Summary
ProblemStatisticValueKeys This enumeration implements all currently defined statistical values of a network design Problem.
SolutionStatisticValueKeys This enumeration implements all currently defined statistical values of a solution of a network design problem.
